scripts.generate: npm run prisma-generate && npm run proto-generate
scripts.proto-generate: rm -rf src/proto && mkdir src/proto && touch src/proto/.gitkeep && grpc_tools_node_protoc -I ../proto --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./src/proto/ --grpc_out=grpc_js:./src/proto ../proto/trainings.proto && grpc_tools_node_protoc -I ../proto --ts_out=./src/proto/ --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts ../proto/trainings.proto && sed -i 's|import \* as grpc from "grpc"|import \* as grpc from "@grpc/grpc-js"|g' src/proto/trainings_grpc_pb.d.ts
